title: Waskaduwa - land and proposed luxury apartment complex plans and approvals
details: Plans have been drawn for a 96 rooms beach apartment complex including boutique apartments closer to the beach with in the vicinity of Tangerine Beach Hotel . These plans have also been submitted to the UDA and is awaiting approval. More information can be revealed upon your request. The land in question is to be sold with these plans. 3D images of the proposed apartment complex is attached in the add along with pictures of the land. Please feel free to email for more information.
